display.title: The Digital Age? Already!?
description: Getting into Applied Energistics at this point is possible, but also a little bit involved...
You will need to make quite a few &&7LV&&r machines, and the &&7LV-tier&&r recipes for some AE2 items are comparatively expensive without access to more advanced technology.

&&9Note:&&r This pack includes &&5Fluix Crystals&&r, but they are generated as a GT material, rather than the default AE2 Fluix Crystals. To get them, put &&dFluix Dust&&r in the &&aAutoclave&&r, which is made from &&7Certus Quartz Dust&&r, &&eNether Quartz Dust&&o&&r and &&cRedstone&&r in a &&aMixer&&r. No need to charge the Certus Quartz. It gets... charged in the Mixer... or something like that.

Additionally - a &&6warning&&r. Clicking on the Guide button in Applied Energistics 2 machine GUIs will most likely &&ccrash your game&&r due to an incompatibility with &&eStarlight&&r. If you're looking for guides on &&bApplied Energistics 2&&r, more information can be found:
An &&binstructionary video&&r made by &&aPansmith&&r, which covers Applied Energistics 2 on &&6Minecraft 1.12.2&&r. The fundamentals are still near-identical, however.
